description:
We are moving more and more into a Wayland world and finally Ubuntu with it's 24.10 release is going full default Wayland, 21.04 was on AMD and Intel GPUs, now even on NVIDIA.

title: Ubuntu 24.10 Goes Wayland Default On NVIDIA!?!?
